content: the right side of the heel with this same needle k8 8 9 9 10 from the needle with the heel sts on it slip the remaining sts from the heel needle onto the first needle you should have 20 20 25 25 26 sts on the first and third needles you should have 26 28 30 32 34 sts on the second needle instep row 1 needle one k to last 3 sts on needle k2tog k1 one stitch decreased needle two knit all sts needle three k1 ssk k to end of needle one stitch decreased row 2 needle one k to end of needle needle two * k1 tbl * repeat from * to * to the end of needle two needle three k to end of needle repeat row 1 and 2 of instep until there are 13 14 15 16 17 sts on needles one and three and 26 28 30 32 34 sts on needle two copyright 2019 yarn café creations christy houghton vanilla shortbread by christy houghton 4 section 3 the foot row 1 k all sts row 2 needle one k to end of needle needle two * k1 tbl * repeat from * to * to end of needle needle three k to end of needle repeat row 1-2 for 4 5 5 0 5 5 6 0 6 5 section 4 the toe row 1 needle one k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle two k1 ssk k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle three k1 ssk k to end four stitches decreased row 2 k all sts repeat row 1 and 2 until there are 4 sts on needles one and three and 8 sts on needle two using needle three k the four sts on needle one you should now have 8 sts on each of the two remaining needles cut yarn leaving a tail of at least 12 long thread tapestry needle and graft toe closed using the kitchener stitch weave in ends kitchener stitch tutorial https //www purlsoho com/create/kitchener-stitch-video/ thank you for downloading my pattern i appreciate your support any comments or suggestions can be sent to yarncafecreations@gmail com and don t forget to check out my hand-dyed yarn here https //yarncafecreations com copyright 2019 yarn café creations christy houghton
